about_the_game:
Starlab is a 2D space sim featuring a seamless solar system, Newtonian physics, a customizable player character, base building and automation, power grid management, a fleet of vehicles, and an arsenal of weapons to research and discover.

ARRIVING AT EARTH

An unprecedented anomaly has shattered the galaxy’s peace, driving you to the quarantined ruins of humanity’s first star.

AUTOMATE YOUR STARLAB

Progress from chopping trees and mining ore to constructing power plants and automating electric mines. Load vehicles to transport resources seamlessly between worlds, optimizing your interplanetary operations.

ROCKET ACROSS THE SOLAR SYSTEM

Suit up and ensure you have enough oxygen as you rocket yourself to the Moon and beyond, exploring new frontiers and expanding your reach.

Key Features

  • Stylize your character with custom hair, color, and clothing options
  • Pilot rockets, jetpacks, trucks, and more with Newtonian physics for realistic space travel
  • Wield an arsenal of weapons against alien swarms and hostile bots
  • Automate mining, processing, and manufacturing resources to streamline your operations
  • Farm crops by planting seeds, watering them, and ensuring they have plenty of light for sustainable food production
  • Build structures from pylons and girders to create robust bases
  • Manage electrical grids with solar panels, power plants, batteries, and power lines to keep your base running efficiently
  • Research next-gen technology from space suits to jet packs, to enhance your capabilities and survival
detailed_description:
Starlab is a 2D space sim featuring a seamless solar system, Newtonian physics, a customizable player character, base building and automation, power grid management, a fleet of vehicles, and an arsenal of weapons to research and discover.

ARRIVING AT EARTH

An unprecedented anomaly has shattered the galaxy’s peace, driving you to the quarantined ruins of humanity’s first star.

AUTOMATE YOUR STARLAB

Progress from chopping trees and mining ore to constructing power plants and automating electric mines. Load vehicles to transport resources seamlessly between worlds, optimizing your interplanetary operations.

ROCKET ACROSS THE SOLAR SYSTEM

Suit up and ensure you have enough oxygen as you rocket yourself to the Moon and beyond, exploring new frontiers and expanding your reach.

Key Features

  • Stylize your character with custom hair, color, and clothing options
  • Pilot rockets, jetpacks, trucks, and more with Newtonian physics for realistic space travel
  • Wield an arsenal of weapons against alien swarms and hostile bots
  • Automate mining, processing, and manufacturing resources to streamline your operations
  • Farm crops by planting seeds, watering them, and ensuring they have plenty of light for sustainable food production
  • Build structures from pylons and girders to create robust bases
  • Manage electrical grids with solar panels, power plants, batteries, and power lines to keep your base running efficiently
  • Research next-gen technology from space suits to jet packs, to enhance your capabilities and survival

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core 2.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM 4.0 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM 4.0 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Starlab

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU with 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Embark on the ultimate sci-fi adventure in Starlab! Commandeer a fleet of advanced spacecraft, arm yourself with futuristic weaponry, and launch into the cosmos. From Earth to the far reaches of space—build cutting-edge research labs, fend off alien bugs, and dismantle rogue automatons.
